select min(status) as status from order_out_details where order_out_id = #{order_id}

select a.*,b.item_name,b.item_code,b.item_desc,b.manufacturer,b.origin,d.package_level,c.package_code, ROUND((a.qty * e.package_meas / d.package_meas),3) as uom_qty,a.order_out_id as order_id from order_out_details a inner join bas_item b on a.item_id = b.item_id inner join bas_package c on c.package_id = a.package_id inner join bas_package_items d on d.package_item_id = a.package_item_id inner join bas_package_items e on e.package_id = c.package_id and e.package_level = 1 where a.order_out_id = #{order_out_id} and a.status < #{status} order by a.line_no

select a.*,b.item_name,b.item_code,b.item_desc,b.manufacturer,b.origin,d.package_level,c.package_code, ROUND((a.qty * e.package_meas / d.package_meas),3) as uom_qty,f.loc_code,g.area_code,g.area_name,a.cmd_line_no as line_no from cmd_out a inner join bas_item b on a.item_id = b.item_id inner join bas_package c on c.package_id = a.package_id inner join bas_package_items d on d.package_item_id = a.package_item_id inner join bas_package_items e on e.package_id = c.package_id and e.package_level = 1 inner join bas_location f on f.loc_id = a.loc_id_real inner join bas_area g on g.area_id = f.area_id where a.order_id = #{order_out_id} and a.cmd_state >= #{start_state} and a.cmd_state <= #{end_state} order by a.cmd_line_no

select a.order_id,a.review_no,a.pack_no,a.barcode,a.merge_barcode,a.review_type,count(1) as count_row, a.cmd_state,b.USER_NAME as review_staff from cmd_out a left join sys_user b on a.review_staff_id = b.user_id where a.order_id = #{order_out_id} and a.cmd_state >= #{start_state} and a.cmd_state < #{end_state} and a.barcode != 'N/A' and a.barcode is not null and a.pack_no != 'N/A' and a.pack_no is not null --@ and b.user_name = #{user_name} group by a.order_id,a.review_no,a.pick_group,a.pack_no,a.barcode,a.merge_barcode,a.review_type,a.cmd_state,b.USER_NAME

select a.order_out_id as order_id,a.line_no as line_no,a.item_id,a.qty,nvl(a.bwave_cancel_qty,0) as bwave_cancel_qty, nvl(a.cancel_qty,0) as cancel_qty,a.status from order_out_details a inner join order_out b on a.order_out_id = b.order_out_id where b.wh_id = #{wh_id}
